      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17028945">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17028945">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17028945">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17028945">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <p>
           <br />
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17028945" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17028946">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17028946">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17028946">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17028946">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17028946" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17028948">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17028948">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17028948">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Supreme Court Cases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17028948">
          <div id="boxatt17028948" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20076192">
              <a id="link_20076192" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.findlaw.com/casecode/supreme.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20076192,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Constitutional History of the U.S.', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20076192}); ">
               Findlaw: Supreme Court
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Searchable archive of decisions since 1893.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20076202">
              <a id="link_20076202" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20076202,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Constitutional History of the U.S.', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12464702}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription database. Contains all Supreme Court cases. Choose U.S. Legal &gt; Federal and State Cases &gt; Jurisdiction: U.S. Supreme Court.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20076317">
              <a id="link_20076317" href="http://www.law.cornell.edu/supremecourt/text/home" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20076317,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Constitutional History of the U.S.', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20076317}); ">
               Legal Information Institute: Supreme Court
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               See "archive of decisions." Selected historic cases compiled by the Legal Information Institute of Cornell University. Arranged by topic, by author, and by party.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23707375">
              <a id="link_23707375" href="http://www.americanbar.org/groups/public_education/publications/insights/teaching_legal_docs/reading_a_supremecourtbrief/syllabus.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23707375,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Constitutional History of the U.S.', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23707375}); ">
               Reading a Supreme Court Brief
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               From the American Bar Association.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17029179">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17029179">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17029179">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Peer-reviewed scholarly journal articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17029179">
          <div id="boxatt17029179" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20076446">
              <a id="link_20076446" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20076446,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Constitutional History of the U.S.', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Interdisciplinary, largely full-text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20481227">
              <a id="link_20481227" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20481227,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Constitutional History of the U.S.', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to historical research about U.S. history, 1492-present. Links through "Get It" to JSTOR and Project Muse.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25164779">
              <a id="link_25164779" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25164779,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Constitutional History of the U.S.', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23698321">
              <a id="link_23698321" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23698321,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Constitutional History of the U.S.', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A substantive archive of more than 300 scholarly history journals, all full text. As an archive, there is typically a lag time of 3-5 years from publication until new issues appear in JSTOR. Full text journals include American Historical Review, Journal of American History, Journal of American Studies, Review in American History, Comparative Studies in Society and History, Cultural Critique, Eighteenth Century Studies, Environmental History, Historical Journal, and History and Theory.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17028949">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17028949">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17028949">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly sources published as books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17028949">
          <div id="boxatt17028949" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23698316">
              <a id="link_23698316" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23698316,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Constitutional History of the U.S.', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17028950">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17028950">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17028950">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary sources published on the web
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17028950">
          <p>
           <a href="http://memory.loc.gov/ammem/amlaw/lawhome.html">
            <em>
             A Century of Lawmaking for a New Nation
            </em>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://memory.loc.gov/ammem/collections/continental/index.html">
            <em>
             Documents from the Continental Congress and the Constitutional Convention
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17028950" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20076423">
              <a id="link_20076423" href="http://lcweb2.loc.gov/ammem/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20076423,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Constitutional History of the U.S.', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20076423}); ">
               American Memory
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library of Congress-managed digital archive culled from research collections throughout the country. See especially the collections titled A Century of Lawmaking for a New Nation and Documents from the Continental Congress and the Constitutional Convention.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4630168" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17028951">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17028951">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17028951">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Style guides
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17028951">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           Or visit the
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           at Purdue.
          </p>
          <p>
           The full text of the Chicago Manual of Style, 16th ed. is available to Muhlenberg College students
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=Http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/16/contents.html">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Here is a
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            user guide
           </a>
           to Zotero. NOTE: In order to construct footnotes (as opposed to bibliography), the
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/support/word_processor_plugin_installation_for_zotero_2.1">
            MS Word Plug-In
           </a>
           is needed.
          </p>
          <p>
           Help with annotated bibliographies
          </p>
          <p>
           Visit Purdue's
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           for definitions and
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
            format
           </a>
           of an
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17028951" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17028952">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17028952">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17028952">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17028952">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17028952" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
     <div id="footer_topline">

      </span>

      or
      <a href="/content_mobile.php?pid=561691&amp;sid=4630168">
       mobile devices
      </a>
      .
     </div>
